languages.text: Исследовательские стремления не находят одобрения со стороны дознавателя ван Калокса. Хотя Хейнрикс согласен, что для борьбы с врагами Империума стоит знать их получше, он опасается, что не подготовленные умы могут стать жертвами собственного любопытства и впасть в ересь.

traits.locale_text: Хотя именно эти ксеносы не известны дознавателю ван Калоксу, его обширный опыт и знания из архивов Инквизиции позволяют сделать вывод, что разрушенное производство манипулировало основами материи и пространства — непостижимая для Империума технология, исследовать которую было бы крайне неразумно.

languages.text: Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.
languages.original_text: Исследовательские стремления не находят одобрения со стороны дознавателя ван Калокса. Хотя Хейнрикс согласен, что для борьбы с врагами Империума стоит знать их получше, он опасается, что не подготовленные умы могут стать жертвами собственного любопытства и впасть в ересь.

traits.locale_text: The exploratory ambitions find no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that it is worth knowing the enemies of the Imperium well in order to fight them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

The exploratory ambitions find no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that it is worth knowing the enemies of the Imperium well in order to fight them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

languages.text: 冯·卡洛克斯审讯官并不赞成这种求知欲。尽管他赞同，充分了解人类之敌确实有助于帝国摧毁它们，但他担心，那些对此毫无思想准备的人反而会被自己的好奇心毒害，从而沦为异端。
languages.original_text: Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

traits.locale_text: 冯·卡洛克斯审讯官并不赞成这种求知欲。尽管他赞同，充分了解人类之敌确实有助于帝国摧毁它们，但他担心，那些对此毫无思想准备的人反而会被自己的好奇心毒害，从而沦为异端。

languages.text: このような旺盛な探究心を、インテロゲイターのヴァン・カロックスは認めない。ハインリックスは、帝国の敵をよく理解することが、帝国の敵を滅ぼす能力を向上させるということには同意しているものの、隙のある心が好奇心に負け、異端に陥ることを懸念している。
languages.original_text: Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

traits.locale_text: このような旺盛な探究心を、インテロゲイターのヴァン・カロックスは認めない。ハインリックスは、帝国の敵をよく理解することが、帝国の敵を滅ぼす能力を向上させるということには同意しているものの、隙のある心が好奇心に負け、異端に陥ることを懸念している。

languages.text: Tal apetito inquisitivo no encuentra la aprobación del Interrogador van Calox. Aunque Heinrix está de acuerdo en que comprender bien a los enemigos del Imperium mejorará su capacidad para destruirlos, teme que las mentes poco preparadas se conviertan en víctimas de su propia curiosidad y caigan en la herejía.
languages.original_text: Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

traits.locale_text: Tal apetito inquisitivo no encuentra la aprobación del Interrogador van Calox. Aunque Heinrix está de acuerdo en que comprender bien a los enemigos del Imperium mejorará su {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} para destruirlos, teme que las mentes poco preparadas se conviertan en víctimas de su propia curiosidad y caigan en la herejía.

languages.text: Ein solch neugieriger Appetit findet nicht die Zustimmung von Interrogator van Calox. Heinrix stimmt zwar zu, dass es wichtig ist, die Feinde des Imperiums zu verstehen, um sie besser vernichten zu können. Er fürchtet jedoch, dass ein unvorbereiteter Verstand zum Opfer seiner eigenen Neugier werden und in die Ketzerei verfallen könnte.
languages.original_text: Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

traits.locale_text: Ein solch neugieriger Appetit findet nicht die Zustimmung von Interrogator van Calox. Heinrix stimmt zwar zu, dass es wichtig ist, die Feinde des Imperiums zu verstehen, um sie besser vernichten zu können. Er fürchtet jedoch, dass ein unvorbereiteter Verstand zum Opfer seiner eigenen Neugier werden und in die Ketzerei verfallen könnte.

languages.text: L'interrogateur van Calox condamne fermement votre curiosité qu'il juge déplacée. Si Heinrix reconnaît que la compréhension des ennemis de l'Imperium améliorera sa capacité à les anéantir, il craint que des esprits mal préparés ne s'abandonnent à leur soif de connaissance au risque de basculer dans l'hérésie.
languages.original_text: Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.

traits.locale_text: L'interrogateur van Calox condamne fermement votre curiosité qu'il juge déplacée. Si Heinrix reconnaît que la compréhension des ennemis de l'Imperium améliorera sa capacité à les anéantir, il craint que des esprits mal préparés ne s'abandonnent à leur soif de connaissance au risque de basculer dans l'hérésie.

languages.text: Sorgucu van Calox, bu meraklı yaklaşımı tasvip etmiyor. Heinrix her ne kadar İmparatorluk'un düşmanlarını anlayarak onları yok etmekte daha başarılı olabilecekleri konusunda hemfikir olsa da, hazırlıksız zihinlerin meraklarına yenik düşüp kâfirlik işlemesinden korkuyor.
languages.original_text: Such inquisitive appetite finds no approval from Interrogator van Calox. Though Heinrix agrees that understanding the enemies of the Imperium well will improve the Imperium's ability to destroy them, he fears that unprepared minds may become victims of their own curiosity and fall into heresy.
